channel.title: Rant on Robot Librarian
channel.description: Recent content in Rant on Robot Librarian

item.title: Intuition-based librarianship?
item.description: Not long after I started working in the library, I heard someone talking about “Evidence Based Librarianship.” Like the good little kind-of-a-librarian I’d become, I looked it up and found this article which states that: EBL employs the best available evidence based upon library science research to arrive at sound decisions about solving practical problems in librarianship. My immediate response was, of course, What the $#!&% is everyone else doing?
